attributes.action: Allow parents to join British Citizens, as adult dependents parents.
attributes.additional_details: This is causing a lot of families to split and not been able to meet thier parents for a long time specially during COVID we can’t go and meet our parents.This ruling discriminates the rights and responsibilities of different U.K. Citizens just because someone's parents are not residing within EEA country This ruling must be changed. All UK Citizens must be allowed the right to get their parents as a dependent relative and If one is paying their taxes and executing their social like all citizens
attributes.background: All we want the government to change the adult dependent visa rule requirement for parents or introduce a visa for adult parents so they can join their British national children. Many people are stuck because of jobs they do and they are unable to go to their parents when they need them.
